raml
  • Reference
  • Articles

Takes the inner product of a variable array and a numeric array.

Takes the inner product of a variable array and a numeric array.

dot(a, b)

# S4 method for numeric,ramlArray
dot(a, b)

# S4 method for ramlArray,numeric
dot(a, b)

Arguments

a

An array of class "numeric".
b

An array of variables.

Examples

m <- Model()
m$var(x[1:3] >= 0)
m$constraint(dot(x, c(1,1,1)) >= 1)
